NAME

META_FILLREGION

NEAREST API CALL

#include <windows.h>
BOOL32 FillRgn
(
HDC32 hdc,
HRGN32 hrgn,
HBRUSH32 hbrush
);

DESCRIPTION

U16 array noValue
0 region object no
1 brush object no
FillRgn fills the region identified by the first param with the brush identified with the second param.

back
